profile_data.summary:
Proficient Data Scientist with a Master of Science degree in Data Science from the University at Buffalo, New York, with over five years of professional experience in the IT industry. My career has focused on creating innovative solutions in Machine Learning, Generative AI, and Software Development, with applications spanning the automotive, technology, and business sectors.

With expertise in Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI tools like LangChain, I have developed advanced AI-driven systems that enhance decision-making and operational efficiency.

ðŸ”¹ Key Highlights:

Generative AI Solutions: Designed and implemented applications using LangChain and OpenAI APIs, including a company insights app with real-time stock analysis and competitor research capabilities.
AI-Powered Risk Detection: Built a compliance-focused NLP system leveraging BERT and other LLMs to detect sensitive information during virtual business meetings, achieving great accuracy and reducing data breach risks by 30%.
NLP-Based Chatbots: At Ford Motor Company, developed real-time chatbots using Semantic Search techniques for question-answering, automating customer support in the automotive sector and enhancing user experience.
ML Proof-of-Concepts: Delivered classification and anomaly detection models for predictive analytics, leveraging Python libraries such as scikit-learn, pandas, and PyCaret, improving efficiency across operations.
Deep Learning Expertise: Applied object detection frameworks like YOLO and PyTorch to solve complex image analysis problems, showcasing proficiency in CNN-based architectures.
ðŸ”¹ Tech Portfolio:

Programming & Tools: Python, SQL, C#, PyTorch, Keras, Flask, Django, JavaScript, HTML, pandas, scikit-learn, seaborn, matplotlib, PyCaret.
Databases: PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server, Oracle DB, MongoDB, SQLite.
Machine Learning Techniques: Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest, CNNs, NLP (Semantic Search, Question Answering), Anomaly Detection.
Generative AI Tools: LangChain, OpenAI APIs, LLM Chain, and prompt engineering techniques.
Deep Learning Tools: YOLO, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and advanced CNN architectures.
With a passion for integrating cutting-edge technologies like Generative AI and LLMs, I am dedicated to delivering impactful solutions that solve real-world problems. I am actively seeking full-time opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects, optimize processes, and drive transformative business outcomes.

member.occupation: Senior Analyst - Data Science(GEN AI)- Infosys Topaz, USA | 5+ years experience in IT Industry from India | MS in Data Science | ML, Gen AI, RAG, AgenticAI |

projects.description:
This project focuses on predicting customer churn (attrition) using an Artificial Neural Network (ANN) model trained on a customer dataset with demographic and financial features. The project demonstrates end-to-end implementation of a machine learning solution, from data preprocessing to model deployment.

The dataset contains 10,000 records with features such as customer geography, gender, age, credit score, balance, tenure, and more. The target variable indicates whether a customer churned (1) or stayed (0).

The ANN was built and trained using TensorFlow/Keras, with the following configurations:

Activation Functions: Relu in intermediate layers, Sigmoid in the output layer for binary classification.
Optimizer: Adam optimizer with a learning rate of 0.01.
Loss Function: Binary Cross-Entropy.
Early Stopping: Implemented to prevent overfitting, reducing training time by halting when validation loss stagnates.
Key technologies like TensorBoard were utilized to monitor training progress through loss and accuracy visualizations, weight distributions, and neural network architecture debugging.

The model was deployed as a Streamlit web application, allowing users to input custom data and receive real-time churn probability predictions. The app provides an intuitive interface and showcases how machine learning models can be operationalized for business use cases.

Technical Highlights:
Preprocessed the data by encoding categorical variables and scaling numerical features.
Saved the model in H5 format and encoded preprocessing steps using Pickle for reusability.
Achieved early stopping after 20 epochs, optimizing training time and validation performance.
Deployed an interactive, user-friendly web app to simulate real-world usage.
This project is an excellent demonstration of applying data science, machine learning, and deployment skills to solve business-critical problems.
projects.title: Customer churn using Artificial Neural Networks(ANN)

projects.description:
"Company Search" is a Streamlit app designed to simplify the process of gathering and understanding information about companies. By leveraging OpenAI's powerful language models, this app provides users with a comprehensive overview of a company's history, products, and services in just a few clicks. Additionally, it tracks a company's highest stock price in 2021 and highlights competitors who outperformed them that year.

Key Features:

Company Overview: Delivers concise information about a company's background and offerings.
Performance Tracking: Analyzes and displays the company's top stock price in 2021 and identifies stronger competitors during that period.
Powered by AI: Utilizes OpenAI's API, Langchain, and custom prompt chains to efficiently extract and present relevant data. Langchain's chain feature ensures seamless conversation flow in the app.
How It Works:

Enter the company name.
The AI processes extensive data in seconds using pre-trained models via OpenAI's API.
Results are presented clearly in an intuitive Streamlit interface.
Tech Stack:

OpenAI API (model: gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct)
Langchain (ConversationBufferMemory, Sequential Chain, PromptTemplate)
Streamlit
Python
Use Cases:

Investors: Quickly evaluate company performance and compare it with competitors.
Job Seekers: Research potential employers and gain insights into the competitive landscape.
Business Analysts: Streamline data collection and analysis for reports and presentations.
Motivation: Driven by a passion for making complex tasks more accessible through AI, "Company Search" aims to democratize access to valuable company information. Special thanks to Krish Naik for his educational content on LLM and Machine Learning, which inspired this project.
projects.title: Company Search with LangChain, OpenAI APIs & Streamlit

Created a synthetic dataset with fictional credit card details for sensitive information protection. Utilized Python's SpaCy for named entity detection with pre-trained NLP models and stored predictions in MongoDB. NVIDIA GPU facilitated training of large models.

projects.description:
- Market Dynamics: Witnessed a surge in demand for used vehicles, underscored by their cost-effectiveness, reliability, and environmental sustainability.
- Operational Hurdles: Identified a significant barrier for potential buyers in sifting through an expansive inventory, necessitating extensive time and analytical effort.
- Technical Innovation: Implemented a robust PostgreSQL database management system, enhancing the efficiency and precision of pre-owned vehicle searches.
- Schema Engineering: Methodically constructed and optimized database tables and schemas, employing principles of relational database design to establish a scalable and maintainable data model.
- Normalization Mastery: Executed comprehensive data normalization, applying 1NF, 2NF, 3NF, and BCNF techniques to mitigate data redundancy and ensure data integrity.
- Advanced Data Manipulation: Utilized Python's Pandas library for sophisticated data cleansing and structuring, transforming raw data into logically segmented dataframes for optimal database integration and query performance.
